body: Please don't use initializers, pass static weights using `weightDescriptors` argument of `onnxInitGraph`. Encoding large amounts of data into protobuf is expensive, and its easy to hit 2GB protobuf limit.
body_html: Please don't use initializers, pass static weights using weightDescriptors argument of onnxInitGraph. Encoding large amounts of data into protobuf is expensive, and its easy to hit 2GB protobuf limit.
body_text: Please don't use initializers, pass static weights using weightDescriptors argument of onnxInitGraph. Encoding large amounts of data into protobuf is expensive, and its easy to hit 2GB protobuf limit.
